Haven't watched this one yet but it downloaded very quickly. Just a word of warning, I received a total of 8 DMCA notices for this torrent from Qwest, my ISP. There were 6 for Dinner for Schmucks and one for Xmen 1st Class. I do use Peerblock so there must be a few IP's that haven't been updated to the list yet.
